sect2.title: Installation of Avifile
sect2.para: Install Avifile by running the following commands:

userinput.command: install -d /usr/lib/avifile-0.7/win32 && tar xzvf ../binaries-011002.tgz -C /usr/lib/avifile-0.7 && ./autogen.sh && ./configure && make maintainer-clean && ./autogen.sh && ./configure --prefix=/usr --with-qt-prefix=/opt/qt \ --with-win32-path=/usr/lib/avifile-0.7/win32 && make && make install
